member.name: M:TipCatDotNet.Api.Controllers.AccountController.Add(TipCatDotNet.Api.Models.HospitalityFacilities.AccountRequest)
member.summary: Adds an account to a current member if they don't have any.

member.name: M:TipCatDotNet.Api.Controllers.MemberController.Add(TipCatDotNet.Api.Models.HospitalityFacilities.MemberInfoResponse,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds or updates a member to an account.

member.name: M:TipCatDotNet.Api.Controllers.MemberController.AddCurrent
member.summary: Creates a current member from registration details. Suitable for account managers only.

member.name: M:TipCatDotNet.Api.Controllers.MemberController.Get(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a member of an account by ID.

member.name: M:TipCatDotNet.Api.Controllers.MemberController.Remove(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a member from an account.

member.name: M:TipCatDotNet.Api.Controllers.MemberController.UpdateCurrent(TipCatDotNet.Api.Models.HospitalityFacilities.MemberUpdateRequest)
member.summary: Updates a current member from registration details. Suitable for account managers only.

member.summary: Updates a avatar current member from registration details. Suitable for account managers only.
